walker.easydb.exception
Class IllegalParamException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          walker.easydb.exception.BaseException
              walker.easydb.exception.IllegalParamException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class IllegalParamException
extends BaseException

如果方法的参数值不满足要求, 则抛出此异常. This Excepion throwed if the parameter value is not meet with some method.

Author:
HuQingmiao
